Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1501 S. MOPAC EXPRESSWAY,SUITE 450, AUSTIN, Texas, 78746, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Open Lending Corp is engaged in providing automated lending services to financial institutions. The company offers loan analytics, risk-based pricing, risk modeling, and automated decision technology. Its Lenders Protection Program (LPP), enables automotive lenders to make loans that are largely insured against losses from defaults.

value.name: Charles D. Jehl
value.title: CEO, CFO, COO, Treasurer, Director & Executive VP
